shoppingCart

Interface IShoppingCartService


  • public interface IShoppingCartService
    Interface to a Shopping Cart Service. It manages a set of shopping carts and a set of transactions made by clients. It is assumed one cart per client: when a new cart is created, it deletes the existent one and creates a new one. When the client executes the payment, a new order is created and stored; and a new cart is created.
    Author:
    Elisabet Arratia

    • Method Detail

      • createCart

        void createCart(java.lang.String userId)
        Creates a new cart
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the client's ID for which a new cart is created. If the user already has a shopping cart, it is replaced by the new one.

      • payAndCheckout

        void payAndCheckout(shoppingCart.Payment payment)
        Represents the payment of the products in the cart: the order with the payment is stored and a new cart is created
        Parameters:
        payment - The transaction being executed: it must contain the shopping cart

      • addItem

        void addItem(java.lang.String userId,
             int idProduct,
             float quantity)
        Adds a product and its quantity to the cart of a specific user
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the client's ID.
        idProduct - The ID of the product that is to be added to the cart of the user with ID idUser. If the product already exists, it adds it again.
        quantity - The quantity of the product added to the cart

      • removeItem

        void removeItem(java.lang.String userId,
                int idProduct)
        Removes a product from the cart of a specific user
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the client's ID.
        idProduct - the ID of the Product to be removed from the cart of the user with ID idUser. If the item doesn't exist, the method doesn't do anything.

      • getShoppingCart

        shoppingCart.ShoppingCart getShoppingCart(java.lang.String userId)
        Gets the Shopping cart of a specific user with ID idUser
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the client's ID.
        Returns:
        the shopping cart of user idUser. If the user doesn't exists, it returns null.

      • numberOfShoppingCarts

        int numberOfShoppingCarts()
        Gets the number of Shopping carts in the DB
        Returns:
        the number of Shopping carts in the DB

      • numberOfTransactions

        int numberOfTransactions()
        Gets the number of transactions in the DB.
        Returns:
        the number of transactions in the DB
